mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp ( empno, ename, job, sal ) VALUES ( #{empno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{sal} )
INSERT INTO dept ( deptno, dname, loc ) VALUES ( #{deptno}, #{dname}, #{loc} )
INSERT INTO users ( id, pw, name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pw}, #{name} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw}
